events.title: TechFest 2025
events.description: An inter-departmental tech competition featuring coding, robotics, and hackathons.
events.speaker: Various Department Heads

events.title: Entrepreneurship Workshop
events.description: Learn how to pitch your startup ideas from industry experts.
events.speaker: Industry Experts

events.title: Coding competition
events.description: Coding competition for all students to showcase their programming skills.
events.speaker: CS Department Faculty

events.title: Guest Lecture: Self Development
events.speaker: Mr. Aman Dattawal
events.description: A guest lecture by Mr. Aman Dattawal on Self Development in today's world.

news.title: New Research Lab Inaugurated
news.content: The Computer Science Department inaugurated a new AI Research Lab with advanced computing resources.

news.title: Library Open 24x7 During Exams
news.content: Students can access the library round the clock during the semester exam period.

news.title: Alumni Meet Scheduled
news.content: An alumni meet is scheduled for 30th June 2025 to reconnect with former students and share experiences.

news.title: New Sports Complex Opened
news.content: A new sports complex has been opened to promote physical fitness and sports activities among students.

news.title: New Course on AI and Machine Learning
news.content: A new elective course on AI and Machine Learning will be offered from the next semester.

news.title: Tree Plantation Drive
news.content: A tree plantation drive will be held on campus to promote environmental sustainability.
